acceptance-of-delivery@0.0.3.name: acceptance-of-delivery
acceptance-of-delivery@0.0.3.description: This clause allows the receiver of goods to inspect them for a given time period after delivery.

fragile-goods@0.0.4.name: fragile-goods
fragile-goods@0.0.4.description: This clause specifies penalties for shocks caused to a fragile package in transport.

helloworld@0.0.5.name: helloworld
helloworld@0.0.5.description: This is the Hello World of Accord Protocol Templates. Executing the clause will simply echo back the text that occurs after the string `Hello` prepended to text that is passed in the request.

helloworldstate@0.0.5.name: helloworldstate
helloworldstate@0.0.5.description: This is the stateful Hello World of Accord Protocol Templates. Executing the clause will simply echo back the text that occurs after the string `Hello` prepended to text that is passed in the request along with the number of times the clause has been called.

installment-sale@0.0.3.name: installment-sale
installment-sale@0.0.3.description: This is a clause for a simple installment sale.

ip-payment@0.0.3.name: ip-payment
ip-payment@0.0.3.description: This clause is a payment clause for IP agreement, such as trademark or copyright licenses aggreements.

latedeliveryandpenalty@0.0.4.name: latedeliveryandpenalty
latedeliveryandpenalty@0.0.4.description: A sample Late Delivery And Penalty clause.

perishable-goods@0.1.0.name: perishable-goods
perishable-goods@0.1.0.description: This clause specifies penalties if the transport conditions (temperature and humidity) for a package are breached.

saft@0.1.1.name: saft
saft@0.1.1.description: The SAFT contract is a futures contract where a person invests in a company in exchange for receiving utility tokens that may be used when a product launches.

safte@0.1.1.name: safte
safte@0.1.1.description: The SAFTE contract is a futures contract where a person invests in a company in exchange for receiving either utility tokens that may be used when a product launches or equity in the company.

servicelevelagreement@0.0.1.name: servicelevelagreement
servicelevelagreement@0.0.1.description: A service level agreement that gives invoice credit based on service availability.
